Description: Standard convex bicone bead: comprising clay core covered with gold foil.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), 69, 86; Grave register, pl.XXIX; Bead corpus, pl.XXXIX, 82W6.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (119)
